amendment.description: Amendment changes the Federal Cyber Scholarship for Service program to include support for outreach activities that will improve the recruitment of high school and community college students into cybersecurity-related fields.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in House Report 111-410 to amend the Federal Cyber Scholarship for Service program to include support for outreach activities that will improve the recruitment of high school and community college students into cybersecurity-related fields.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kilroy amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 419 - 4 (Roll no. 40).
